author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: A recursive component is one which invokes itself and is useful for displaying comments on a blog, nested menus or anything where the parent and child are the same. In this tutorial, I'll give you a demonstration of how to build a collapsible tree menu.
name: Build A Collapsable Tree Menu With Vue.js Recursive Components
